channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Bing Search for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Bing Search for Android

item.title: CVE-2020-1329|2024-08-04T06:32:01.173Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20bing%20search%20for%20android
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when Microsoft Bing Search for Android improperly handles specific HTML content, aka 'Microsoft Bing Search Spoofing Vulnerability'.
